original_text: And this thing became sin unto the house of Jeroboam, even to cut it off, and to destroy it from off the face of the earth.
korean_text: 이 일이 여로보암 집에 죄가 되어 그 집이 땅 위에서 끊어져 멸망하게 되니라

sentences.original_text: And this thing became sin unto the house of Jeroboam,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이 일은 여로보암의 집에 죄가 되었으며,

sentences.original_text: and to destroy it from off the face of the earth.
